languages.text: Как только команда запускает варп-двигатели, несколько залпов пробивают корпус вашего судна, нанося колоссальный урон по множеству корабельных отсеков. Двигатели отказывают, а капитан Ла Буш лишь снисходительно смеется — птичка не покинет клетку, пока она этого не захочет.

traits.locale_text: Как только команда запускает варп-двигатели, несколько залпов пробивают корпус вашего судна, нанося колоссальный урон по множеству корабельных отсеков. Двигатели отказывают, а капитан Ла Буш лишь снисходительно смеется — птичка не покинет клетку, пока она этого не захочет.

languages.text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.
languages.original_text: Как только команда запускает варп-двигатели, несколько залпов пробивают корпус вашего судна, нанося колоссальный урон по множеству корабельных отсеков. Двигатели отказывают, а капитан Ла Буш лишь снисходительно смеется — птичка не покинет клетку, пока она этого не захочет.

traits.locale_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its chambers. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely smiles a condescending smile. The bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its chambers. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely smiles a condescending smile. The bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. The bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

languages.text: 你的船员刚刚要启动亚空间引擎，几轮齐射就刺穿了舰体，多处甲板严重受损。当亚空间引擎熄火时，拉·布歇舰长对你露出了居高临下的微笑。只要她不允许，她的鸟儿绝对不可能飞出笼子。
languages.original_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

traits.locale_text: 你的船员刚刚要启动亚空间引擎，几轮齐射就刺穿了舰体，多处甲板严重受损。当亚空间引擎熄火时，拉·布歇舰长对你露出了居高临下的微笑。只要她不允许，她的鸟儿绝对不可能飞出笼子。

languages.text: En cuanto tu tripulación enciende los motores de disformidad, varias andanadas perforan el casco de tu nave, infligiendo daños catastróficos en diversas bahías. Cuando los motores fallan, la capitana La Bouche se limita a sonreír con condescendencia. El pajarito no abandonará su jaula hasta que ella diga.
languages.original_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto tu tripulación enciende los motores de disformidad, varias andanadas perforan el casco de tu nave, infligiendo daños catastróficos en diversas bahías. Cuando los motores fallan, la capitana La Bouche se limita a sonreír con condescendencia. El pajarito no abandonará su jaula hasta que ella diga.

languages.text: クルーが〈歪み〉のエンジンをかけるが早いか、数発の砲弾が船体を貫き、多くの船倉が甚大な被害を負った。エンジンが止まると、ラ・ブッシュ船長は蔑むような笑みを浮かべる。この鳥は彼女が許すまで籠から出られないのだと。
languages.original_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

traits.locale_text: クルーが〈歪み〉のエンジンをかけるが早いか、数発の砲弾が船体を貫き、多くの船倉が甚大な被害を負った。エンジンが止まると、ラ・ブッシュ船長は蔑むような笑みを浮かべる。この鳥は彼女が許すまで籠から出られないのだと。

languages.text: Kaum startet deine Crew die Warp-Triebwerke, durchbohren mehrere Salven die Hülle deines Schiffs und fügen vielen der Module kolossalen Schaden zu. Als die Triebwerke ausfallen, grinst Captain La Bouche nur herablassend. Dieser Vogel verlässt den Käfig erst dann, wenn sie es entscheidet.
languages.original_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

traits.locale_text: Kaum startet deine Crew die Warp-Triebwerke, durchbohren mehrere Salven die Hülle deines Schiffs und fügen vielen der Module kolossalen Schaden zu. Als die Triebwerke ausfallen, grinst Captain La Bouche nur herablassend. Dieser Vogel verlässt den Käfig erst dann, wenn sie es entscheidet.

languages.text: Dès que votre équipage commence à lancer les moteurs du Warp, plusieurs salves percent la coque de votre vaisseau, infligeant ainsi des dégâts colossaux à de nombreuses baies. Alors que le moteur lâche, la capitaine La Bouche vous adresse un sourire condescendant. L'oiseau ne quittera pas la cage avant qu'elle ne le décide.
languages.original_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.

traits.locale_text: Dès que votre équipage commence à lancer les moteurs du Warp, plusieurs salves percent la coque de votre vaisseau, infligeant ainsi des dégâts colossaux à de nombreuses baies. Alors que le moteur lâche, la capitaine La Bouche vous adresse un sourire condescendant. L'oiseau ne quittera pas la cage avant qu'elle ne le décide.

languages.text: Mürettebat öteboyut motorlarını çalıştırır çalıştırmaz birkaç salvo, geminin gövdesini delip geçiyor ve birçok bölmeye devasa hasar veriyor. Motorlar devre dışı kalırken Kaptan La Bouche sadece, küçümseyici bir gülümseme takınıyor. Bu kuş, o söyleyene kadar kafesten çıkmayacak.
languages.original_text: As soon as your crew starts the warp engines, several salvos pierce the hull of your ship, dealing colossal damage to many of its bays. As the engines give out, Captain La Bouche merely dons a condescending smile. This bird isn't leaving the cage until she decides it.
